name: url-to-png
description: url-to-png is a self-hosted microservice to capture full-page screenshots of URLs and return PNG images. It exposes a simple HTTP API and optional minimal web form for ad-hoc use.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Capture website screenshots via simple HTTP API calls with URL parameters

features.title: Full
features.description: Render complete web pages including content below the fold

features.title: Custom Dimensions
features.description: Specify viewport width and height for screenshots of any size

features.title: Format Options
features.description: Return screenshots as PNG images with configurable quality settings

features.title: Javascript Rendering
features.description: Execute JavaScript on pages before capturing for dynamic content

features.title: Custom Delays
features.description: Wait for specified time before capturing to allow content to load

features.title: Headless Browser
features.description: Use headless Chrome for accurate rendering of modern web pages

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Cache screenshots to improve performance for repeated requests
